name: Space Chaos (itch) (DinoExplore)
description:
Space Chaos is a small fast-paced top-down shooter game where you control a small spaceship, shoot at enemy ships and avoid asteroids.

 The game has a highscore  system that will let you see how far you got.

 Other than that it isn't anything special, but this is my first Unity game (without following any major tutorials) and I felt like i should share it. 

The music and art is also made by me. (In other words, don't expect much :D)

Have fun!
